description: This source file defines an Angular component 'RecipeListComponent' which displays a list of recipes with search functionality. It manages recipe data fetching, user input, loading states, and error handling.

classes.name: RecipeListComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying a searchable list of recipes, managing user input, and rendering recipe cards.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes subscriptions to query input and performs initial recipe fetch.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up subscriptions when the component is destroyed.

methods.name: onQueryChange
methods.description: Handles user input change and emits the new query.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refetches recipes based on the current query.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Calls the recipe service to retrieve recipes matching the query, updates loading/error state accordingly.
